description.value:
Requirements You have successfully identified the target with Recall Knowledge during this combat.

Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses. Attempt a Strike against the target; if successful, you deal an additional [[/r 1d6 #precision]] precision damage. If you have succeeded on a Recall Knowledge check against the target during this combat and their creature type was previously recorded using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Thorough Reports]{Thorough Reports}, you also deal [[/r 1 #persistent bleed]] point of persistent bleed damage. The creature is then temporarily immune to Discerning Strike for 1 day.
